title: SOLD 1913-15 Pinkerton Blank Back Christy Mathewson  SGC 40/3
author: BLongley

posts.post_title: SOLD 1913-15 Pinkerton Blank Back Christy Mathewson  SGC 40/3
posts.post_content:
Asking SOLD , PayPal f/f dlvd. 

That's just my shadow on the back and not a stain, though there are a few light markings that you can see in the pic. There are no creases that I can see anywhere on the card.
Brian, that’s a sweet card!  Good luck with the sale.

Thanks Eric... I am a fan too, but my collecting heart lies mostly with Cobb and WaJo, and with recent purchases need to move some stuff. 

Bump it up... feel free to make reasonable offers. Thanks Brian
